portfolio.stock.view

Class PortfolioViewImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • portfolio.stock.view.PortfolioViewImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortfolioView

    public class PortfolioViewImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioView
    The class implements the view interface and all the methods provided by it. It uses a readable object to take inputs from the user. It uses an appendable object to print on stdout and a scanner to parse the input given by the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PortfolioViewImpl(java.lang.Readable in, java.lang.Appendable out)
      Constructs an object by initializing on, out and sc.

      Prints a message that the market is closed on a particular day.
